column4: i am having trouble. when i spoof my wireless interface (ath0) i cannot connect to my wireless router anymore. it acts as if my encryption password is wrong or something. the nm-applet application repeatedly asks me for my wep key, and when watching iwconfig, all looks normal, just no connection. anyone have any ideas?
funny how it can be my isp when it wont form a connection to my wireless router.
please do not cry in the channel, go ask on a forum, and be patient
